name: CHAOS AFTER WORK
description:
WREAK MAYHEM IN THIS FAST PACED ACTION GAME. You are an IT office worker with a corner cabin who is tired of life, everything that you do feels meaningless and you want to quit your job. You never felt any joy in doing what you are doing now. One day you wake up with a blinding light in your eyes, you realize that you didn’t wake up to the sunlight through the window of your bedroom. You see alien like being coming at you with surgical tools and you fight back. You realize you were abducted by aliens in your sleep. At first, you feel scared, but a split moment later realize, you are finally doing something apart from waking up to work in a boring office, finally, something fun, FINALLY A CHANCE TO WREAK MAYHEM!!!

Minimum requirements: 

4 GB Ram

TEAM:

Coding, modelling, rigging :- Lavitrox204

Level design, concept art, weapon concept, story, character design:- Elfoil02 on youtube

Music :-Dominik Giesriegl
